code: import{api}from"../apiClient";export var getMessages=function getMessages(id,cursor){return api.get("/messages/".concat(id,"/").concat(cursor?"?cursor=".concat(cursor):""," "));};export var sendMessage=function sendMessage(channelId,data,onUploadProgress){return api.post("/messages/".concat(channelId),data,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"},onUploadProgress:onUploadProgress});};export var deleteMessage=function deleteMessage(id){return api.delete("/messages/".concat(id));};export var editMessage=function editMessage(id,text){return api.put("/messages/".concat(id),{text:text});};
